hero.description: 3+ years of experience building scalable infrastructure and creating fast, secure websites and mobile applications

quote.text: Build scalable solutions, write clean code, make fast & secure products
quote.author: Muhamad Irvan Dandung

about.title: about-me
about.description1: I'm a Senior Software Developer with 3+ years of experience in building robust and scalable applications. I specialize in backend technologies (PHP, Java, Kotlin, Go) and modern frontend development (TypeScript, React).
about.description2: I'm passionate about building fast, secure, and scalable infrastructure. I have hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and GCP. I'm always exploring new technologies and best practices.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.interested: I'm interested in software engineering opportunities. Whether it's
contacts.description: full-time, freelance, or collaboration, feel free to reach out

aboutMe.title: about-me
aboutMe.bio1: I'm a Senior Software Developer with 3+ years of professional experience. I specialize in building scalable infrastructure and creating fast, secure applications across multiple platforms.
aboutMe.bio2: My expertise spans full-stack development with strong fundamentals in both backend (PHP, Java, Kotlin, Go) and frontend (TypeScript, React) technologies. I'm proficient with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP).
aboutMe.bio3: I'm passionate about writing clean code, following OOP principles, and building data structure-efficient solutions. When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and contributing to the developer community.
